Articles.Content: I noticed you were working in a new ice giant. Is that going to in this pack, or is it another pack you are working on?
Colas (That new ice giant I'm making) is going to be in another pack, JID00Gaming.

Colas (That new ice giant I'm making) is going to be in another pack, JID00Gaming.

what is the name of the pack?

Colas (That new ice giant I'm making) is going to be in another pack, JID00Gaming.

What is the pack called? And when do u think youll have it released?

EDIT: sorry, i double posted

Edited February 23, 2015 by KwerbalBase
how many plants is in the new pack?

I haven't decided the pack's name, but it will only add 1 planet (Colas), which is a GP2, but with a sort of twist: It orbits between Duna and Jool, in an orbit similar to that of Dres, and it explains why there's no other bodies in Kerbol's asteroid belt. (They're all pulled into orbit around Colas) Colas itself will have some rings, and 3 or 4 moons.

EDIT: I think I'll release it sometime this week.
Is this compatible with the outer planets mod
Actually, no. Because Outer Planets is not compatible with ANY other KopernicusTech planet packs.

Actually, no. Because Outer Planets is not compatible with ANY other KopernicusTech planet packs.

I believe it is compatible with the Kirius system.
Uh... That's not possible. They use different versions of Kopernicus.

Uh... That's not possible. They use different versions of Kopernicus.

What the? I have both Outer Planets and Kirius installed.

Uh... That's not possible. They use different versions of Kopernicus.

They do.

What the? I have both Outer Planets and Kirius installed.

Your planets will glitch in PQS then.

They do.

Your planets will glitch in PQS then.

Well, I haven't actually been to any of the planets in the OPM pack since I started Kirius, heh. Just removed it, though.
How exactly do you fix the 90Ã‚Â° light bug ? As I need to fix this bug for my mod.
I fixed it by changing the normal maps opacity to 127 in Paint.net. (You can change it to 50% opacity if that's how your editing program works)
Great ! I will do it right now !
Are you planning any new bodies?

I'm running this with OPM and OP+. So far so good, all seems to be running smoothly and not too RAM heavy, which is good.

Are you planning any new bodies?

I was wondering about this too.

And also have you had any progress with giving Zem-Po a tail? There has been at least one planet mod... New Kerbol? Or something like that... that had a comet with a tail. It wasn't dynamic and didn't disappear at the Apkelion but it was really cool.

I know how to add a tail to Zem-Po.

You need to go in KittopiaTech, select Zem-Po, select "Add particle system".

Then, you choose the sun as target object, and you put a NEGATIVE speed scale. It will make the tail go away from the sun instead of going toward it.

I'm aware of KittopiaTech's particle system, but I'm just not that happy with it. First, it's a bit too complicated, with all these decays rates and particle amount settings that I don't understand, and, secondly, the tail will still be there even when Zem-Po is at it's apoapsis.
Hmmm yeah. Do you know another way to do a tail ?
No, I don't think there is. NovaSilisko had comet tails in his now defunct Alternis Kerbol mod, but that both uses a custom plugin AND doesn't work anymore. But still, those comets looked amazing.
The only way is to use the particle system...but if you don't want to...
Instead of a super Moho, why not something that looks like Kepler 10b, with an entire ocean of lava on the sunward side (that is, if it is even possible to add an ocean to a world).
